QueryResult.text: SELECT P.ID BENEFIT_PLAN_ID, SUM(ROUND(B.SLICE * (B.FINISH_DATE - B.START_DATE),2)) ACT_BENEFIT_AMOUNT FROM FIN_BENEFIT_PLAN_DETAILS BPD, ODF_SSL_BFT_DTL_ABFT B, PRJ_BLB_SLICEREQUESTS SR, FIN_PLANS P WHERE BPD.ID = B.PRJ_OBJECT_ID AND B.SLICE_REQUEST_ID = SR.ID AND SR.REQUEST_NAME = 'benefitplandetail::actual_benefit::segment' AND BPD.PLAN_ID = P.ID GROUP BY P.ID
